section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Eastman is a member of Cefic, VCI, VNCI, essenscia, AmCham Belgium and Netherlands, ECPA, ACC and other small Trade Associations.
goals__remit: Eastman is a global specialty chemical company that produces a broad range of advanced materials, additives and functional products, specialty chemicals, and fibers that are found in products people use every day. As a world leader in the diverse markets it serves, Eastman is focused on delivering innovative and technology-based solutions while maintaining its commitment to safety and sustainability.
